title: Indian WWI Troops Praying Image MCQ 4

content.description:
INDIAN MUSLIM TROOPS IN THE BRITISH ARMED FORCES PRAYING. PHOTOGRAPH TAKEN IN SURREY, ENGLAND, 1916

FPG / Staff

In the background, a group of British civilians, mostly women, are watching the troops pray.
content.question: As shown in the image, the deployment of soldiers by European powers most directly relates to which of the following causes of conflict during the early twentieth century?

choices.label: The network of rival alliance systems
Imperialist expansion and competition for resources
Decline in global economic production and trade

content.answer: Imperialist expansion and competition for resources

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
